content: lion brand pattern # 70473ad skill level beginner vanna s choice® article #860 3 colors 1 ball each *shown in antique rose dusty rose taupe * crochet hook - size q-19 **15 75 mm** gauge 3 v-stitches + 4 row = about 6 in 15 cm in pattern with 3 strands 1 strand each of a b and c held together scarf is worked lengthwise in v_stitch for 6 row with 3 strands of yarn held together throughout add fringe to finish similar pattern 80022ad crochet 2-1/2 hour or less scarf 1 does not have fringe and works up to a slightly different size 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/crochet-2-1-2-hour-or-less-scarf
